ModMetaData.name: Outer Rim - Furniture & Decor
ModMetaData.description: Outer Rim module containing all the furniture, decals, joy buildings, statues, etc. If loaded without Outer Rim - Core it will automatically patch all contained items to use vanilla materials in place of the usual Outer Rim ones, and switch the required research to Complex Furniture.
ModMetaData.author: Neronix17
